General.Name: Suzhou GYZ Electronic Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Suzhou GYZ Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, designs, and produces components in the optical, automotive electronics, optoelectronic semiconductors, and other fields in China. It also offers electronic components for mobile phone optics. The company offers metal insert molding IM parts, CMI parts, and metal stamping parts. In addition, it produces and sells plastic products, electronic components, communication, electromechanical, hardware and electromechanical equipment, and other metal materials. Further, the company designs, develops, manufactures, processes, and sells precision molds and automation equipment and handicrafts, as well as involved in technical consultation of electronic products. Suzhou GYZ Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2013 and is based in Kunshan, China.
